nodes.html: Funding agencies (including WHO and Gates Foundation) have recently mandated that authors must publish exclusively in fully-OA journals.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Our response to this change is to maintain the IJTLD for authors in LMICs who lack OA funding, while also launching a new title, IJTLD OPEN. This allows us to have a fully compliant OA journal that will enhance our coverage of TB and lung disease.

nodes.html: Both journals have the same Editorial Board with an identical peer review process and acceptance criteria. The only difference occurs after acceptance – authors with OA funding will be published in IJTLD OPEN.
